text: List of Indo-European languages This list is of Indo-European languages. These languages all sprung from a common source called Proto-Indo-European. * Armenian * Albanian * Baltic languages ** Latvian ** Lithuanian * Celtic languages ** Goidelic languages ** Brythonic languages * Germanic languages ** North Germanic languages *** Danish *** Faroese *** Icelandic *** Norwegian *** Swedish ** West Germanic languages *** Dutch *** English *** German **** Austrian German **** Bavarian **** Pennsylvania Dutch *** Scots *** Yiddish ** East Germanic languages *** Gothic * Greek * Italic languages ** Latin ** Romance languages *** Catalan **** Valencian *** Corsican *** French *** Italian *** Romanian **** Moldavian *** Sardinian *** Spanish *** Portuguese * Indo-Iranian languages ** Indo-Aryan languages *** Gujarati *** Hindi *** Bengali *** Konkani *** Marathi *** Nepali *** Punjabi *** Sanskrit *** Sinhala *** Dhivehi ** Iranian languages *** Kurdish *** Persian *** Pashto *** Zazaki * Slavic languages ** East Slavic languages *** Belarusian *** Russian *** Ukrainian **** Carpathian Rusyn ** West Slavic languages *** Czech-Slovak languages **** Czech **** Slovak **** Pannonian Rusyn *** Lechitic languages **** Polish **** Pomeranian **** + Kashubian **** + Slovincian **** Polabian *** Sorbian **** Upper Sorbian **** Lower Sorbian ** South Slavic languages *** Eastern **** Bulgarian **** Macedonian *** Western **** Serbo-Croatian ***** Bosnian ***** Croatian ***** Serbian ****** Montenegrin **** Slovenian * Category:Language-related lists
title: List of Indo-European languages
